mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as dealNum, housedeal.aptCode, houseinfo.apartmentName as aptName, houseinfo.dong as dongName, houseinfo.dongCode as dongCode, houseinfo.lng, houseinfo.lat, ANY_VALUE(housedeal.dealAmount) as any, avg((SUBSTRING_INDEX(housedeal.dealAmount, ',', 1)*1000+SUBSTRING_INDEX(housedeal.dealAmount, ',', -1))) as avgAmount FROM housedeal INNER JOIN houseinfo on housedeal.aptCode= houseinfo.aptCode and dongCode = #{dongCode} GROUP BY houseinfo.aptCode ORDER BY ${sortBy} ${sortOrder}
